page.title: 20CUSTOMS
page.content: {a)THE HISTON FAIR.}ON THE GREEN BY THE DUCK POND WITH STALLSPROVIDES A LOT OF FUN AND AMUSEMENT FOR THE YOUNG AND OLD ALIKE.EVERY YEAR PEOPLE ASSEMBLE AROUND THE VILLAGE POND TO WATCH THE GREASY POLE BEING PLAYED BY TO PEOPLE ON EITHER END MOVING TOWARDS THE MIDDLE WITHOUT FALLING OFF.{c)THE {HISTON PRIMARY SCHOOL FETE }IS ENTERTAINING WITH FLOATS,FANCY DRESS, TREASURE HUNT ETC. {d)IMPINGTON V.C. } FETE IS HELD IN THE SPRING,SUMMER AND AT CHRISTMAS WITH MANY STALLS ARE RUN BY THE PUPILS OF THE COLLEGE TO RAISE MONEY FOR CHARITIES,BOTH LOCAL AND NATIONAL.MONEY IS ALSO GIVEN TO INTER- NATIONAL AID AGENCIES.THE FETES ALSO BRING THE SCHOOLS AND THE COMMUNITY TOGETHER.
